name: Critical Gravity
description: Feel the G-force! That's for sure in this gut grinding Virtual Reality racer/puzzler. Progress to new tracks by passing the checkpoints and reaching the finish. Race the AIs and test your skills under pressure. Try to cheat by jumping sections.. as long as you hit the checkpoints....
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 SP1 or newer. Processor: Intel i5-4590 processor equivalent or greater Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD 290 equivalent or greater Storage: 500 MB available space Additional Notes: Oculus Rift Support Only
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Window 10 Processor: i7 or greater Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 980 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 500 MB available space Additional Notes: Oculus Rift Support Only
